title: Vocabulary Maps Overview
body: In this course, you will learn the importance of explicit vocabulary instruction and how to prepare for Vocabulary Map instruction.

title: Vocabulary Maps Instruction
body: In this course, you will learn key instructional steps for explicit instruction using VocabularyMaps through a classroom scenario.

title: Vocabulary Maps Completion
body: In this course, you will learn more about the features of the Vocabulary Map and their importance through a peer teacher scenario.
